data.text: @ACPSk12 REPORT by Pfizer’s “Worldwide Safety” division: “CUMULATIVE ANALYSIS OF POST-AUTHORIZATION ADVERSE EVENT REPORTS…THROUGH 28-FEB-2021.” Data shows that the Pfizer shot has a 3% mortality rate, which is 12 times the COVID death rate. https://t.co/hxWLjdLm61
@ACPSk12 Why are these signs still up? https://t.co/guobPgJWMS
@ACPSk12 Why are you pushing an experimental technology that causes heart damage? Are federal funds ACPS received tied to pushing this agenda? https://t.co/kXqSq26D2F
@ACPSk12 Never for kids. No other countries are pushing this on our kids.
